Text:
I can only assume that The Pirate Bay upload code automatically strips embedded URL's since there is nothing after "For more information visit:".  Let's see if it will allow me to enter it here. . .  If the next line does not contain a Web Site Address, then sorry, I tried!
h t t p : forward slash forward slash z e i t g e i s t m o v i e dot c o m

Hello Everyone,

I have seeded this movie for approximately 44 Hours and uploaded over 10GB.  In an effort to not piss off my ISP, I am going to continue seeding until around midnight Saturday (EST).  The trend that I am seeing from most of you so far is once you have 100% of the file you stop seeding and move on.  So, if anyone actually reads these comments, this is your fair warning that the ElvisNewKing gravy train ends in approximately 22 hours in case someone else is interested in receiving the torch and taking over to keep this torrent alive.

Happy Holiday's to everyone, and I hope you find this movie thought provoking !!!

Amazing Movie .
Put together very well and flows nicely throughout .

That's all folks.  I hope someone else can seed this movie for a while.  Gotta' take a break for a few days.  If anyone is interested, perhaps I can re-seed after I return from Christmas Vacation.

Take care and be well!
